about_the_game:
Add 120 more Cosmic Beauties to Hentai Senpai: Cosmic Beauties - Premium Pack

Thats 120 new swapping/rotating puzzles with increasing difficulty to solve.
Be rewarded with an up close view of all 120 Cosmic Beauties in the gallery!
Hentai Senpai: Cosmic Beauties - Premium Pack includes all 5 Premium Cosmic Beauties packs seen in the base game!

Add these new spicy Cosmic Beauties to your collection now with Hentai Senpai: Cosmic Beauties - Premium Pack!

content_descriptors.notes:
Hentai Senpai: Cosmic Beauties - Premium Pack has graphic sexual content including nudity, sex, genitalia, bondage, sex toys, tentacles & masturbation.

All characters are adults (18+).
